text: yeah definitely go for it! a layout position at blue zoo is super rare!  It is a bit hard to focus, but I try to break it  up with exercise if I feel like I am losing focus. Also I find its really good to set yourself daily goals, and promise yourself a reward for finishing them! We have daily catch ups with our anim teams to make sure we are all doing ok and getting through the schedule on time :slightly_smiling_face:
